*/var TodoItem=function TodoItem(_ref){var id=_ref.id,content=_ref.content,color=_ref.color,checked=_ref.checked,onToggleItem=_ref.onToggleItem,onRemoveItem=_ref.onRemoveItem;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"todo-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"remove",onClick:function onClick(){return onRemoveItem(id);}},"\xD7"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"todo-text ".concat(color," ").concat(checked==='true'?'checked':''),onClick:function onClick(){return onToggleItem(id,checked);}},content),checked==='true'&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"check-mark"},"\u2713"));};export default React.memo(TodoItem);
